title: A Place Called Morning
description: “Tatlock follows a fine debut with yet another incisive look at family life and secrets.” -- Library Journal.  Booklist, Starred Review!   Mae Demaray retreats from life after her young grandson dies accidentally while under her care. What was once a quiet life in an old clapboard house on a quiet Minneapolis street, rich with the hues of security and love, is now shattered. But a decades-old family secret, based on an unlikely friendship over the years, brings redemption and restoration once it is revealed.
author: Ann Tatlock
